name: Rainbow Dash glass Youtube
description:
This is a cool Rainbow Dash glass theme for Youtube.
This theme is unfinished, but working. Preview-Image is not updated.
additional_info:
Version: 3.0 - 11/22/14
Credits: CoolRainbow

changelog --

10/25/14 - uploaded theme
11/01/14 - completed theme
11/22/14 - fixed theme
1/30/15 - new transitions
2/7/15 - Color fix for searchbar

info -- 

If you want to change the background simply go to the body tag in css and search for: 'background: url'
and enter an image url inside the brackets.

discussions.name: Everything behind the border of my screen is white.
There's nothing else but a deadly black screen
